changeSet.author: Ahmed.Baz
changeSet.sql: insert into products (id, name, description, quantity, price) values (nextval('products_seq'), 'product 1', 'description for product 1', 100, 19.99), (nextval('products_seq'), 'product 2', 'description for product 2', 150, 24.99), (nextval('products_seq'), 'product 3', 'description for product 3', 80, 12.99), (nextval('products_seq'), 'product 4', 'description for product 4', 102, 39.99), (nextval('products_seq'), 'product 5', 'description for product 5', 60, 7.99), (nextval('products_seq'), 'product 6', 'description for product 6', 120, 14.99), (nextval('products_seq'), 'product 7', 'description for product 7', 182, 29.99), (nextval('products_seq'), 'product 8', 'description for product 8', 40, 9.99), (nextval('products_seq'), 'product 9', 'description for product 9', 250, 49.99), (nextval('products_seq'), 'product 10', 'description for product 10', 30, 11.99)
